metadataAttributes.Title: Culture-Driven Team Building Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Culture-Driven Team Building. Master strategies and tools that will enable you to more effectively form, join, and lead teams
metadataAttributes.Skills: Team dynamics, Team Building, Collaboration, Intercultural Communication, Organizational Anthropology, Cultural Learning, Leadership, Organizational Culture, Emotional Intelligence, Team Management,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Greg Urban, Ph.D. ,Derek Newberry, Ph.D. ,Dr. Aviva Legatt ,Alan Barstow, Ph.D. ,Dana Kaminstein, Ph.D. ,Ramya Kumar, MSOD, PGDHRM, SHRM-SCP ,Amrita V. Subramanian ,
